name: Fat Raccoon Crime`s
description:
Who are the raccoons?! We are raccoons! What do we need!? Food from trash cans! 

People throw valuable food in the trash! This must not be allowed, immediately move out into the street and collect all the food! For the glory of raccoons!

One more point:

W-A-S-D (or left stick on gamepad) - move your fat raccoon,

SPACE (or west button on gamepad) - wiggle your hands to  shoveling rubbish,

SHIFT (or south button on gamepad) - sprint your fat raccoon

Spesial for speedruners:

BACKSPACE (or select button on gamepad) - restart level with timer.

All music and big arts was generated with AIVA and Stable Diffusion.

Part of resources used from 

vecteezy.com,opengameart.org,pngwing.com,zvukipro.com
